- üëÄ I‚Äôm interested in <code>Fluid Dynamics</code>, CFD, Turbulence Modelling, <code>Applied Mathematics</code>, Heat Transfer, ML applied to fluid dynamics as well as several other mechanical, bio-mechanics and aerospace engineering related arenas.
- üå± I‚Äôm currently working on <code>Boundary Layer Problems</code>, <code>Fluid-Structure Interaction</code>, <code>Computational Fluid Dynamics</code>.
-  üíûÔ∏è I‚Äôm looking to collaborate on <code>machine learning</code> applied to turbulent flows and <code>FSI</code> problems.
- üì´ Feel free to contact me at: me.akanand@gmail.com
